article_title: Former Arizona senator Ward sees chance against McCain
article_text:

og.description: Former state Sen. Kelli Ward, the Republican from Lake Havasu City hoping to oust U.S. Sen. John McCain in the August primary, paid a visit to Yuma last week to try to build up support for a run against an opponent she says has "100 percent name recognition."
og.title: Former Arizona senator Ward sees chance against McCain

article_metadata.description: Former state Sen. Kelli Ward, the Republican from Lake Havasu City hoping to oust U.S. Sen. John McCain in the August primary, paid a visit to Yuma last week to try to build up support for a run against an opponent she says has "100 percent name recognition."
